title: nee padha pankajamula
sahitya:
nI pada pankajamula nE nera namminAnu



anupallavi



 bhUpAlula garvambu lanacu koraka paramEshvaru cApamu druncina



caraNam 1



 kOpamutO munu tApasi iccina shApamuna ahalya anudinamu 

cAparAti tanutApa morvani Apenu gani paritApamu dIrcina

   

caraNam 2



 vanaruha tulita nayana sankrandana tanayuni bAdha sahimpani virOcana- 

sutu madi galigina bhaya megayaga ghana tama dundubhi bEnutala dannina

   

caraNam 3



 jyAvaranuta jyAjAvara biDau jAvarAja shrta tyAgarAja 

jyAvarAja rudrA-vanIsura bhavanIya muni jIvana anishamu
